tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    participant_age INT,
    participant_gender VARCHAR(10),
    race_category_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE races (
    race_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    race_name VARCHAR(50),
    race_location VARCHAR(100),
    race_date DATE,
    race_distance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    race_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    finish_time TIME,
    result_comment TEXT
);
